statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT contact_person, phone_number, supplier_name FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY contact_person DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' AND contact_person <> 'John Doe';
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE unit_price > 10 AND discount_rate < 0.5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_pricing WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM product_pricing ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1 OR supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_number FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, quantity FROM supplier_contacts JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id;
SELECT delivery_date, product_name, quantity FROM delivery_schedules JOIN product_pricing ON delivery_schedules.product_id = product_pricing.product_id;

SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_number, delivery_date, product_name, quantity FROM supplier_contacts JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id JOIN product_pricing ON delivery_schedules.product_id = product_pricing.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_number FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supplier_contacts JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM supplier_contacts JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id JOIN product_pricing ON delivery_schedules.product_id = product_pricing.product_id WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT product_id, price FROM product_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, delivery_date, delivery_time, product_id FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%';
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_time FROM delivery_schedules WHERE product_id = 1 AND delivery_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts JOIN product_pricing ON supplier_contacts.id = product_pricing.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email_address FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT contact_number, supplier_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing INNER JOIN delivery_schedules ON product_pricing.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email_address FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT p.product_name, c.supplier_name, p.price FROM product_pricing p JOIN supplier_contacts c ON p.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE p.price > 100;

SELECT s.supplier_name, d.delivery_date, d.delivery_location FROM supplier_contacts s JOIN delivery_schedules d ON s.supplier_id = d.supplier_id WHERE d.delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT i.inventory_id, i.quantity, p.product_name, p.price FROM product_inventory i JOIN product_pricing p ON i.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY i.quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
